directions: Pour the evaporated milk and dry pudding mix into a container with a lid, seal it, and shake for 45 seconds to combine. Let the pudding set for 5 minutes.
In 2 large parfait glasses, alternate layers of chocolate pudding with layers of cherry pie filling. Top each glass with whipped topping, and sprinkle with cinnamon. Chill for 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste
title: Quickie Chocolate Cherry Parfait
